entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 4:31 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -19.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times in the evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
